ygData.subject: RE: Thread was closed
ygData.msgSnippet: Try sending it to Aurum at Eqvault, and Whoever at Stratics as a news item. Try everlore also.Perhaps if it is spread onto news sites, it will be read? ...
ygData.messageBody:
Try sending it to Aurum at Eqvault, and Whoever at Stratics as a news item.
Try everlore also.Perhaps if it is spread onto news sites, it will be read?

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 23, 2000 10:48 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Thread was closed


From: <kim@...>

On Wed, 23 Feb 2000, Joshua R. Moore wrote:
>
> please do not take this personally, all I was asking is perhaps there is a
> better way. I never said fear the board admins. Why does every fricking
> person on this planet read more into what I say, than what I meant. I hate
> getting words put in my mouth=(

No offense taken. If this were a whine, or gripe about bard
problems, or even a list of ideas for improving the class, I'd
agree with you that senseless bumping was stupid. But it's a
bug report, one that I'm trying desperately to make sure they
see (I'm still working off of no response = haven't read it).

> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Wed, 23 Feb 2000, Joshua R. Moore wrote:
> >
> > You folks do know that annoying them to death is not likely to work very
> > well, right?=)
> >
> > Not saying I disagree with you, but perhaps we need to go about this
> another
> > way than annoying the board admins with bumping
>
> Read my post. It's a bug report. If you think we shouldn't
> bring bug reports to their attention for fear of annoying
> them... well, I don't want to play whatever game you're in
> charge of. :)
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
